text:
Caleb Reginald McLaughlin (born October 13, 2001) is an American actor. He is best known for starring as Lucas Sinclair in the Netflix series "Stranger Things". He appeared as "Young Simba" in the Broadway musical "The Lion King", between 2012 and 2014.
McLaughlin was born in Carmel, New York. He is the son of April and Corey McLaughlin.
